{"settings":"{
  // Editor Appearance & UX
  "editor.fontFamily": "Cascadia Code",
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  "editor.fontSize": 25,
  "editor.lineHeight": 30,
  "editor.cursorSmoothCaretAnimation": "on",
  "editor.cursorBlinking": "phase",
  "editor.cursorStyle": "line-thin",
  "editor.wordWrap": "on",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "editor.smoothScrolling": true,
  "editor.renderWhitespace": "all",
  "editor.folding": true,
  "editor.foldingStrategy": "auto",
  "editor.accessibilitySupport": "auto",
  "editor.quickSuggestions": { "strings": "on", "comments": "on", "other": "on" },
  "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
  "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
  "editor.occurrencesHighlight": "singleFile",

  // Biome as default formatter
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome",
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
  "editor.formatOnSaveMode": "modificationsIfAvailable",
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.organizeImports.biome": "explicit",
    "source.fixAll.biome": "explicit"
  },

  // Language-specific defaults
  "[javascript]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome" },
  "[typescript]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome" },
  "[typescriptreact]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome" },
  "[json]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome" },
  "[jsonc]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "biomejs.biome" },

  // Files, Explorer & Search
  "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "files.watcherExclude": {
    "**/.git/objects/**": true,
    "**/.git/subtree-cache/**": true,
    "**/node_modules/**": true,
    "**/vendor/**": true,
    "**/coverage/**": true
  },
  "files.exclude": {
    "**/.git": true,
    "**/.DS_Store": true,
    "**/node_modules": true,
    "**/.vscode": false
  },
  "files.autoSave": "onFocusChange",
  "files.hotExit": "onExitAndWindowClose",
  "search.exclude": {
    "**/node_modules": true,
    "**/dist": true,
    "**/build": true,
    "**/coverage": true
  },

  // Language features
  "javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "emmet.includeLanguages": { "javascript": "javascriptreact" },
  "tailwindCSS.includeLanguages": {
    "javascript": "javascript",
    "typescript": "typescript"
  },
  "files.associations": {
    "*.css": "tailwindcss",
    "*.env*": "properties"
  },
  "auto-rename-tag.activationOnLanguage": ["html", "xml", "javascript", "typescript"],

  // Termina──
  // "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "Cascadia Code",
  "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "FiraCode Nerd Font Mono",
  "terminal.integrated.cursorBlinking": true,
  "terminal.integrated.cursorStyle": "line",
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "fish",
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 22,
  "terminal.integrated.scrollback": 10000,
  "terminal.integrated.copyOnSelection": true,

  // Debuggin─
  "debug.console.fontSize": 22,
  "debug.showBreakpointsInOverviewRuler": true,
  "debug.allowBreakpointsEverywhere": true,
  "debug.inlineValues": "on",

  // Git & GitLens─────────
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "git.autofetch": true,
  "git.confirmSync": false,
  "gitlens.defaultDateFormat": "MMMM Do, YYYY",
  "gitlens.hovers.currentLine.over": "line",
  "gitlens.codeLens.enabled": true,
  "gitlens.statusBar.enabled": true,

  // Workbench & Extensions
  "workbench.productIconTheme": "fluent-icons",
  "workbench.editorAssociations": {
    "*.copilotmd": "vscode.markdown.preview.editor"
  },
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
  "workbench.tree.indent": 12,
  "workbench.tree.enableStickyScroll": false,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "React Theme",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "eyecons",

  // Copilot & Telemetry───
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": false,
    "plaintext": false,
    "markdown": false,
    "scminput": false,
    "typescript": false,
    "typescriptreact": false
  },
  "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.enabled": false,
  "extensions.autoUpdate": true,
  "telemetry.telemetryLevel": "off",

  // Custom CSS/JS (if used)───
  "vscode_custom_css.imports": [
    "file:///home/tariqul/.config/Code/User/vs-code.css",
    "file:///home/tariqul/.config/Code/User/vs-code.js"
  ],

  // Misc─
  "cSpell.userWords": ["Tariqul", "Tariqul Islam"],
  "liveServer.settings.donotShowInfoMsg": true,
  "code-runner.runInTerminal": true,
  "database-client.autoSync": true,
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": false,

  // Biome extension: don’t nag for global install
  "biome.suggestInstallingGlobally": false
}
"}
